titleStmt.title: skyabs 'gro ba'i spyi don
titleStmt.author: gtsang nag pa brtson 'grus seng ge

editionStmt.edition: Digital Edition in Wylie with TEI Markup

licence.p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) licence applies to this document.

physDesc.additional: Script: 'bru tsha. Lines per folio: 10. Orthography: - Bindu for m - Numerals used for numbers and for phonetic value (e.g., 4+n for bzhin) Some gaps in the lines, where glosses linked to a previous lines are written (see fol. 2b) suggest that the copyist copied a version of the text together with the annotations. On fols. 3a and 3b, some numerals above portions of the text.

funder.name: European Research Council
研究活動スタート支援 (Grant-in-Aid for Research Activity Start-up )

projectDesc.p: This document was created and is made available in the framework of the ERC project “The Dawn of Tibetan Buddhist Scholasticism (11th-13th c.) (TibSchol). This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement No. 101001002). See https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/101001002

It also benefitted from the work carried out in the project "チベット仏教カダム派の思想研究に向けた基礎資料の構築 (Construction of Basic Materials for the Study of the Thoughts of the Kadam School of Tibetan Buddhism) funded by the Grant-in-Aid Research Activity Start-up (No. 19K22998). See https://kaken.nii.ac.jp/en/grant/KAKENHI-PROJECT-19K22998/

prefixDef.p: In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "db" prefix point to the project's APIS instance, a database system to collect information of entities.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "per" prefix point to the BDRC's data interface's person module.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "zot" prefix point to a record in the projects's Zotero group.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "corpusmd" prefix point to any element in the corpus TEI document via its ID.

body.ab:
'o na theg pa chen po bas 'bras
bu sangs rgyas 'dod pa de gzhan gyi ched du ma yin naM de smon pa'i sems bskyed las khyar par ci spyod ce na | lo tsa ba na rebeMs pa'i ngo bo la khyad med kyang seMs bskyed beMs pa ni °° dang cho gas daM bcas pa yin la ¦ 'bras
bu'i skyabs 'gro rkyang pa la cho gas khas blangs med pa'i phyir dang ¦ chos yesTentative identification as Nyang bran pa Chos kyi ye shes (ID:3876), gTsang nag pa's teacher rgyu'i skyabs 'gro 'bras bu rkyang pa med kyi dang tshogs na khyad yod pa'i phyir dang | rnaM pa 1 tu na theg chen pas 'bras bu'i thob byar dkon mchog gsum char 'dod pa'i yang phyir ste ¦
skyabs su 'gro ba'i spyi don mang du thos pa'i dge slong brtson 'grus seng ges bkod pa | i thi ||||
